summary: A meek clerk who doubles as an amateur detective investigates some very strange goings-on at a remote mental sanitarium.
cast: Lon Chaney|Gertrude Olmstead|Hallam Cooley|Johnny Arthur|Charles Sellon|Walter James|Knute Erickson|Frank Austin|Edward McWade|Ethel Wales|Elmo Billings|Herbert Prior|William H. Turner|Dorothy Vernon
keywords: psychotronic film|silent film|silent movie|trapped in a house|inmates running the asylum
title: The Monster
